headers.Access-Control-Allow-Methods: GET, POST, HEAD, PUT, PATCH, DELETE, OPTIONS
headers.Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' https://ros-mon-backend.vercel.app 'unsafe-inline'; connect-src https://ros-mon-backend.vercel.app; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; img-src 'self' data:; font-src 'self' data:
